channel.title: Server help
channel.description: I was doing a little testing on my remake and when you get a 99 it logs you out of the client. I dont know if it crashes the server but the only skill i have tested it on is attack. Once you get 99 it just logs you out but you can log back in. I cant find the problem. Any help?

item.title: Server help
item.dc:creator: @imstrength imstrength
item.description:
@imstrength wrote:

Mario PvP:

maybe an gfx or something

thats what i was going to say. his client probably doesnt have the celebrate gfx like the fireworksâ€¦either that or someone changed the gfx for when he gets to a 99.
